{{also|jugendliche}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== Substantivization of {{m|de|jugendlich||youthful}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈjuːɡəntlɪçə/}} * {{audio|de|De-Jugendliche.ogg|Audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|Ju|gend|li|che}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f|Jugendlicher|Jugendliche|m=Jugendlicher}} # [[youth]], [[teenager]], [[adolescent]] (female) {{q|up to 17–19 years of age}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj+noun-f|Jugendlich||pl=|datpl=}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Age]]
